price: 谁以善债借给安拉，他将加倍偿还他，他还受优厚的报酬。
arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: man dhā alladhī yuq'riḍu al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan fayuḍāʿifahu lahu walahu ajrun karīmun
